metadata.description: Novak Djokovic wins 2026 Australian Open Men's Singles

outcome_space.description: Who will the 2026 Australian Open Men's Singles title?
outcome_space.outcome_statement: {outcome} wins the 2026 Australian Open Men's Singles title

base_case.fsp_resolution: FSP=1 if {outcome} is winner of the 2026 title at the Final match of the competition, adjudicated by the chair umpire according to the rules of the Australian Open (evaluates to TRUE). FSP=0 if {outcome} is not formally adjudicated as winner (evaluates to FALSE). FSP=0.5 if there is no formally adjudicated winner of the title (evaluates to UNRESOLVED). Data sources for FSP resolution. Primary source: Australian Open 2026 official announcement on <https://ausopen.com/results>. Secondary sources: Australian Associated Press (AAP)

edge_cases.condition: The competition is cancelled/abandoned at any stage and no champion is adjudicated, and {outcome} has not been officially eliminated/forfeited.
edge_cases.fsp_resolution: FSP=0.5 (evaluates to UNRESOLVED) - there is no formally adjudicated winner of the 2026 title. Data sources: Primary <https://ausopen.com/results>. Secondary <https://www.aap.com.au/>.

edge_cases.condition: {outcome} is officially eliminated/withdraws/forfeits at any stage before being adjudicated champion.
edge_cases.fsp_resolution: FSP=0 (evaluates to FALSE) - failed to win. Data sources: Primary <https://ausopen.com/results>. Secondary <https://www.aap.com.au/>.

oracle_config.description: Manual oracle system for product settlement
